channel.title: I got it all fixed i can log in. i cant find username in rscd db?
channel.description: I can log in and everything now. but i cant find my players user name in my db? someone help i cant find it to set the rank and stats?

item.title: I got it all fixed i can log in. i cant find username in rscd db?
item.dc:creator: @insane_pk insane pk
item.description:
@insane_pk wrote:

ok i switched over to wamp. now i get the connecting to ls thing over and over again. i think the xaamp settings are the ls settings. can someone how to get the correct ls settings for wamp?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2009, 03:33:41 pm[/size][hr]i deleted the root and password entry key on the ls now that i am not using xaamp. now what do i do?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2009, 03:37:56 pm[/size][hr]i got it. had to fix the world settings

Read full topic
item.source: I got it all fixed i can log in. i cant find username in rscd db?

item.title: I got it all fixed i can log in. i cant find username in rscd db?
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

oo
ure using xammp!

u dont need both. u just need to get to phpmyadmin from xammp click on the table called users and there you go

item.title: I got it all fixed i can log in. i cant find username in rscd db?
item.dc:creator: @insane_pk insane pk
item.description:
@insane_pk wrote:

so i need wamp along with xampp?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2009, 02:19:03 pm[/size][hr]I installed wamp. copy the www files into wamp www directory and i clicked start services it went to yellow then right back to red. Why wont wamp start?

item.source: I got it all fixed i can log in. i cant find username in rscd db?

item.title: I got it all fixed i can log in. i cant find username in rscd db?
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

ye lol you need to have wamp running and click phpmyadmin,

then go to rscd db then press the table called "users’’ then look at your name press the pencil looking thing (edit) and then change the info

Read full topic
